Hi,

I am trying to record GWT application that use AJAX request. 
However, JMeter somehow encoded (URL Encode) the request of that AJAX while the actual request is not encoded.
Please refer to the attachment. It contain the image of actual request from browser and request sent by jmeter

text:
Hello,

Also can you attach the text (not screenshot) of request, response and why the request is in red (failing) : Can you show all tabs of View Results Tree (Sampler Result, Response Data and Request)

text: Closing as no feedback from user and issue is not clear.
